```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(knitr)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(httr)
library(rvest)
library(readxl)
library(plotly)
```


```{r}
market_data <- read_rds("rawdata.rds")
market_graph <- market_data |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = Total_Year, fill = x, color = x,
             text = paste("Year:", year, "\n", 
                          "Demand:", Total_Year))) +
  geom_point(alpha = .5) +
  facet_wrap(~x) +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(legend.position = "none") +
  labs(title = "Semiconductor Demand 1986 to 2021",
       subtitle = "The Asia Pacific region has the highest growth in demand\nand also has highest total demand",
       x = "Year",
       y = "Total Semiconductor Demand (millions)",
       caption = "World Semiconductor Trade Statistics (WSTS)")
ggplotly(market_graph, tooltip = "text")
```
